main event: Mr. Vinson R. Smiley, a night watchman at Lunken Airport, observed a brilliantly lighted object making a controlled landing on the airport runway in Covington, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object was described as white, revolving, and about 1/4 the size of the moon., The object appeared unusually brilliant and large., The sighting was verified by the Assistant Manager of Lunken Airport., Several members of the Cincinnati Astronomical Society are involved in the investigation., Photographs were taken on October 7, 1956, but none are included in the report.
witness description: Mr. Vinson R. Smiley, civilian night watchman
